description: CENTRAL LOCATION, PARKING, AND YARD! This 3 bedroom townhome is in a prime location within the RUXTON VILLAGE complex as the main living level backs onto STREET PARKING ACCESS on 113 Avenue and the front faces within the complex, tucked away from the Bypass. It features 9' ceilings throughout the main floor, forced air heating, and A/C on all levels, plus lots of kitchen cupboards and closet space. Enjoy a balcony off the primary bedroom, a balcony off the main level with a gas hook-up for your BBQ, as well as a patio and FENCED YARD OFF YOUR MAIN LIVING SPACE (perfect for pets). EASY ACCESS to downtown Maple Ridge, Save On, Walmart, coffee shops, a farm market, West Coast Express station, the Bypass, trails, a tennis court, and lakes!
